parameters.content:
## Simulate HubSpot API
Product & Promo Generator
Simulates product recommendations and promotions.
Used to personalize the LLM prompt.

## Wait for User Reply
Delays flow to check if user responds.
5-min timer before deciding to send follow-up.

## Log Conversation
Logs: User, Message, Bot Reply, Message Type, Timestamp.
Used for context, follow-ups, and analytics.

## Generate Bot Reply
DeepSeek generates humanlike reply based on chat & context.
Model: deepseek-chat, Temp: 0.8.

## Send Message via Twilio
Sends LLM response back to user on WhatsApp.
âš ï¸ Sandbox Limit: Max 10 unique outbound messages/day (number-specific).
Avoid testing with too many new phone numbers.

## Build Prompt Input
Constructs dynamic prompt for DeepSeek using:

User Message
Product Suggestion
Promo Info
Chat History (if old user)

## New vs Old User
Checks if user exists in Airtable.
Route to new/old user flow accordingly.

## Check User History
Searches Airtable for previous messages from this user.
Helps identify if user is new or returning.

## Incoming WhatsApp Message
Triggered when a user sends a message.
Captures Body, From, To.

## AI WhatsApp Agent Workflow
Handles real-time and follow-up chats via Twilio â†’ DeepSeek LLM â†’ Airtable CRM.
Distinguishes new vs old users. Triggers follow-ups if no reply.

## Check for Reply
Looks for new user message (timestamp > last log).
If none, triggers follow-up.

## Reply Found?
Yes: Restart flow with new message

No: Send follow-up message
